text:
Hi Team,

Have a few doubts. Please help us here:
1. Is there a way to get these api's sorted in any order or possible to send a query param to fetch resources only after a particular time?
    a. <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts|/crm/v3/objects/contacts>
    b. <https://api.hubapi.com/engagements/v1/engagements/recent/modified>
    c. /crm/v3/objects/tickets
    d. */cms/v3/pages/landing-pages*
    e. /cms/v3/pages/site-pages
Updating ALT Text within Files on images using API is this possible ???

Hey I'm using <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/analytics/get-analytics-data-breakdowns|Get analytics data breakdowns> (/analytics/v2/reports/source/...)

There is a metric that is mismatched:
rawViews - 2 Paid Social (=standardViews)
visits - 189 Paid Social
returnlingVisits - 188 Paid Social.

Why is Views lower than Visits?
Also it's a mismatch to the HubSpot interfact Sessions - 190 Paid Social.

Is there a documentation as to what all these mean?
If I'm correct the number for visits should not be bigger than the number of Views

Iâ€™m guessing you are using

_`const axios = require('axios');`_ 

instead of `const axios = require("axios").default;`

hi all. I am looking into creating a blog and HubDB filtering and pagination mechanism that when selecting a tag or filtering option, the content and URL updates, but the page does not reload.

I know how to technically implement all this and know to compensate for server side rendering of the page for SEO.

what I am "struggling" with right now is, unless I am missing something, HubSpot doesn't allow you to access blog or HubDB data via an API on the frontend. all the client libraries are server side code.

i understand why, as to not expose the API secret from a Private App to the frontend, but is there another alternative solution? it seems odd that HubSpot doesn't allow any access to the backend data from the frontend, especially when making the calls from a HubSpot CMS page.

am I missing something?
Sorry for the delay <@U042P4WQRGS>, so if i put this property in API the additional email will be add to the contact right?
